Database ( database = [ "3b3e4a3b-d382-4e98-9950-9b4e8b308c1c" ] ) | Query ( "<encode>select * from server_details sd
left outer join (select *
from jobs jb inner join
(select max(job_start_datetime) as time
from jobs
group by server_id) T on jb.job_start_datetime = T.time
) jb on jb.server_id = sd.ID and jb.job_type_id = 2
left outer join job_type jt on jt.id = jb.job_type_id
left outer join job_status js on js.id = jb.job_status_id</encode>" ) | Import ( frame = [ FRAME489044 ] ) ;
